Imports

spec, package, project, version, git, config, group

Types

Dependency = ref object
  names*: seq[string]
  requirement*: Requirement
  packages*: PackageGroup
  projects*: ProjectGroup

DependencyGroup = ref object of Group[Requirement, Dependency]
  packages: PackageGroup
  projects: ProjectGroup
